attributes.action: UK to initiate & get all NATO partners to defend & secure Ukraine at any cost.
attributes.additional_details: As the UK Govt can recognise Putin's aggression is unnecessary and uncalled for, which is an attack on a democratic European nation therefore after the financial sanctions, it is now time for armed retaliation including no-fly zone on Ukraine air space & all options on board.
attributes.background: UK Parliament to pass the bill and get global NATO partners to stop Putin's aggression and commit to an armed retaliation at any cost to defend freedom & democracy as enough is enough with Putin.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
